idea:

idea:
SmartGaon Development Foundation commonly known as SmartGaon, is an Indian non-profit organization, currently headquartered in Mumbai, India (Registered in 2018).

SmartGaon’s etymology is derived from two words, SMART, an acronym for Sanitized, Modern Urban Facilities, Awareness & Adoption , Self Reliant and Tech Savvy, and GAON meaning village in Hindi.

SmartGaon Development Foundation provides Outreach platform to Non-Profits, Private/Public/Government Organizations of various sectors to come together and with Innovative & collaborative approach work towards Integrated Development of Rural Areas.

SmartGaon is in strategic support with Government of India’s initiatives including Digital India, Swachh Bharat mission, Make in India and Skill India. Our flagship Mobile Application SmartGaon (Smart Village Management Platform) have been admired by Prime Minister of India, Shri Narendra Modi during his Nationwide public addressal program, Mann Ki Baat. This mobile application has various smart features like tracking village development activities, Smart Panchayat Governance, phone directory, event calendar, online education, online Doctor, helpline, Survey for Need assessment & Impact Analysis, News section etc.

In mid-2018, SmartGaon Development Foundation completed it’s first project in Taudhakpur , a remote village in Raebareli, by installing digitized public address systems, CCTV, smart farming practices, mobile app facility in the form of SmartGaon App for global connectivity and other modern amenities. Taudhakpur has been deemed as the first “SmartGaon” (Smart village) of India.
name: SmartGaon Development Foundation

idea: KCONSERVE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED  has always aimed to provide best packaging and dining solutions to the food and QSR industry in India. In our quest to constantly innovate and provide the best, Abhinav Industries is proud to present to you our very own green initiative of decomposable tableware, Our mission is To be a leading company in manufacturing natural plant fiber and other green packaging products for better health of consumers both domestically and internationally and for sustainable environment. We wish to bring about a positive change in the way we live by altering the way we think to make the environment a happier and healthier space to function from.
name: KCONSERVE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: GURUMAULI GENETICS PRIVATE LIMITED is  incorporated with intent of producing high-quality pork at affordable prices to all segments of the Indian society as well as improving the quality of Pig breeds in India. We are Located at Palghar in the state of Maharashtra. Our farm is been designed to give comfort to animals and aiming aspects of healthy pork production.  We have best exotic breeds such as Yorkshire, Landrace and Hampshire. We prepare balanced nutritious feed at our farm and provide to Sows, Boars, Gilts and Piglets as per their requirement. We vaccinate and medicate our animals on timely basis, also we take care of cleanliness and welfare of our animals. We have in-house vet, trained staff and well qualified management staff.
name: GURUMAULI GENETICS PRIVATE LIMITED

name: BRAINTREASURE BUSINESS SOLUTIONS PRIVATELIMITED

idea:
BingeIt is a Premium Content Consultancy Platform that helps OTT viewers to choose the right content to watch. BingeIt provides suggestions by taking genre, emotional quotient, intelligent quotient, social quotient, content history, area of interest, personality, etc of the viewer into consideration It also takes into consideration of one’s mental, psychological, and emotional health while consulting.


Market Potential of BingeIt.

OTTs are outcompeting D2H services.

On the other hand, because OTT platforms are exploding with content and new content is being released on a daily basis, viewers have a plethora of options/choices. However, not all types of content are appropriate for all audiences. BingeIt is a premium service that aims to address the problem of the youth of today who run low on time but are interested in watching the content of their liking but not sure what they'll like.
name: BingeIt

idea: SANJARI EDUCOM PRIVATE LIMITED is an educational company which has created an android & iOS based platform ‘Easy Way Learn’ to learn languages, business skills and creative skills to boost personal growth. We have developed this application with great ease, so that whether the learners are at the beginner or advanced stage; they can select the course which suits their needs. Our aim is to make everyone’s life better and give them a platform to achieve their personal & professional growth. At Easy Way Learn, we offer instructional videos, practice exercises and test series to all the enthusiastic learners around the world.
name: SANJARI EDUCOM PRIVATE LIMITED
